channel.title: Palmyra Stadium on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Palmyra Stadium on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Monday Brief: Budget Day Showdown, Opposition's 'Fugitive' Gets His Day, and Berbice Gets a Stadium
item.description: It’s the Super Bowl of Guyanese politics: Budget 2026 drops while the opposition elects an ‘international fugitive’ as their leader. Plus hotels, stadiums, and that $100,000 cash grant everyone’s been waiting for.
